author: Sarah M.
text: Finally a gloss that actually hydrates. I have tried so many that leave my lips feeling worse, but Rose Garden is different. Obsessed.

author: Maya L.
text: The Nude Awakening shade is exactly what I was looking for. Not too pink, not too brown. Just my lips, but glossy and perfect.

author: Jasmine K.
text: Berry Kiss gives me that effortless put-together look. I wear it every day now.

author: Emma R.
text: Love the formula and the scent is subtle but lovely. Coral Dream is my summer staple.

author: Nicole T.
text: The plumping effect on Cherry Bomb is real but not uncomfortable. My lips look fuller without any weird tingling.

author: Aaliyah J.
text: Clear Intentions over any lipstick = perfect glossy finish. This is my must-have now.
